statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 1 , -7 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 7 \, x + 4 , 7 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 7 \, x - 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + x + 2 , -5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
